data.name: Zombie Slaughter VR
data.detailed_description:
The world is in danger.
Make your way to the evacuation center, take part in the great battle for survival, and discover the cause of the invasion!

As well as enjoying the guns and mayhem of the outbreak, you’ll be able to immerse yourself in the rich, story-driven gameplay. Discover why the zombie infection started, how it spread, and most importantly… who caused it. As you search for answers you may discover things that make you wish you had never started!
Be the zombie hunter the world needs. Help save the world from certain destruction

Collect your weapons, destroy zombies, and stop the zombie apocalypse.Cut down both the dead and the living with an arsenal of melee, ranged, and makeshift weapons, all physics-based objects you can realistically wield.
Features:
- Dismember Zombies
- Full campaign with story-driven gameplay
- Manual and automatic Reloading System
- both hands support
- Throw your weapons and kill zombies
- Slowmotion


DIFFERENT TYPES OF GUNS AND WEAPONS TO KILL ZOMBIES. The ambiance of levels will make you afraid and look constantly around. Convenient controls, realistic weapon behavior, and physics will not leave you apathetic, you want to hit the enemy with the butt of your weapon, no problem, do it and finish the zombie while it lies.

A variety of behavior of zombies will pleasantly surprise and scare you, Try to aim for head-to-kill zombies instantly. Good Luck

data.short_description: The world is in danger. Make your way to the evacuation center, take part in the great battle for survival, and discover the cause of the invade!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 / AMD Ryzen 7 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 / any NVIDIA RTX cards
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

publishers: Saturn VR,NipsApp Gaming Software Pvt Ltd
